jdbm
Interface Serializer<A>

All Known Implementing Classes:
BPage, DefaultSerializer
public interface Serializer<A>

Interface used to provide a serialization mechanism other than a class' normal serialization.

Version:
$Id: Serializer.java,v 1.1 2003/03/21 02:48:42 boisvert Exp $
Author:
Alex Boisvert

Method Summary
 A deserialize(java.io.DataInputStream in)
          Deserialize the content of an object from a byte array.
 void serialize(java.io.DataOutputStream out, A obj)
          Serialize the content of an object into a byte array.
